programme.title: 2023 Hakka EXPO(M) Ep123
programme.desc: The World Hakka Expo is not only to show what Hakka is and its characteristics truthfully and plainly, so that the society can understand Hakka, but also to actively demonstrate the contribution of Hakka social power to human society and its future. Topics and discussions show the karma and harmony between Hakka and local society, and place Hakka in Taiwan at the center of the global Hakka network, linking the world and the future, and highlighting the positive significance of Hakka (culture) to tomorrow's society.

programme.title: Lost Romance(M) Ep12
programme.desc: Xiao-En Zheng is an ordinary editor for romance novels who always dreams that one day a rich hunk would come and save her. One of her enjoyable times is to peek out the window to see Tian-Xing He, who is a CEO working in the next building. Her world changes completely when an accident occurs. She time travels into her novel. Not knowing where she is, she sees Tian-Xing He walking towards her.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep4950
programme.desc:
The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep110
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1021
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep13
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep859860
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep685
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep461
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep23
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idols memory.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: The Trail Of The Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Web Of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called Five Poison Web, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeepers daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: To Kill A Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: A former Monkey Kung Fu master crippled by a ruthless villain is convinced by his young disciple to teach him monkey kung fu, so as to avenge his shame.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Peng fought against many swordsmen and won, so he could not accept his first defeat and wanted to commit suicide. It is at this time that Peng meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader. They fall in love and want to get married. The Sect leader gives Peng the Full Moon Scimitar on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: To Kill A Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: Hex After Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.desc: Cdric works in a company specialized in precision mechanics. Its management, run by an investment fund, is disastrous. As another fund is about to buy it again, Cdric decides to take the company over, giving it to the employees.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his fathers vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Death In The Forest
programme.desc: A teacher and his class come across a body in the forest with artifacts from the local museum, killed in a medieval ritual which involves being tied up and hunted in a forest. Detectives Zeiler and Oberlnder are called to investigate the brutal murder.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelos mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mothers last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: Rites of Passage
programme.desc: Faced with the prospect of having to kill a chicken he had cared for since childhood in a family ritual, Anwar has to come up with a scheme to avoid killing his beloved pet.

programme.title: Parents vs Influencers
programme.desc: Philosophy professor Paolo is a single father who finds himself losing his teenage daughter to her social media addiction. His efforts to dissuade her from using social media ironically results in Paolo becoming a social media influencer himself.

programme.title: Burning Birds
programme.desc: After her husband is murdered by a local militia, Kusum has to support her eight children and her mother-in-law. With the breadwinner gone, Kusum has to make extreme choices in the face of her desperation.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: Irina
programme.desc: Stuck in poverty and desperate to make ends meet, Irina decides to become a surrogate mother. As the baby grows inside her, she must accept that she will have to part with it forever, and she discovers what it means to love and forgive.

programme.desc: The film tells the stories of different people and how they are intertwined surrounding the gruesome death of a man who got thrown out of a window.

programme.title: We'Re The Millers
programme.desc: Jason Sudeikis stars in this buzz-worthy comedy as a small-time suburban pot-dealer who likes to keep a low profile. When he's jumped by some gutter punks who steal his cash and his stash, he finds himself in deep trouble with his supplier, Brad (Ed Helms). In order to make amends, the small-time peddler must become a big-time drug smuggler by bringing Brad's latest shipment in from Mexico. Enlisting his neighbors a cynical stripper (Jennifer Aniston), a streetwise teen (Emma Roberts) and a wannabe customer (Will Poulter) he comes up with a foolproof plan. One fake wife, two pretend kids and a ginormous shiny RV later, "the Millers" are headed south of the border for a Fourth of July weekend that's sure to end with a bang or two!

programme.title: A Man Apart
programme.desc: Sean Vetter and Demetrius Hicks are a pair of DEA agents who think they've made the bust of a lifetime when they capture 'Memo' Lucero, a multi-millionaire drug lord who controlled most of the narcotics traffic along the border of Mexico and the United States. However, with Lucero behind bars, a new and decidedly more dangerous underworld kingpin rises to take his place, and Diablo, soon proves to be even more dangerous than Lucero when he orders his gunmen to assassinate Vetter. While Vetter escapes unharmed, his wife is killed, and Vetter is thrown deep into despair. Now Vetter is obsessed with bringing Diablo to justice, and he's willing to do anything to bring him down - even if it means teaming up with Lucero.

programme.title: The Hangover Part Iii
programme.desc: It's been two years since the guys prowled the seamy side of Las Vegas in a roofie haze and recovered from being kidnapped, shot at and chased by drug-dealing mobsters in Bangkok. Phil, Stu and Doug are happily living uneventful lives at home. The only member of the Wolfpack who's not content is Alan. Still lacking a sense of purpose, the group's black sheep has ditched his meds and given in to his natural impulses in a big way which, for Alan, means no boundaries, no filters and no judgment until a personal crisis forces him to finally seek the help he needs. And who better than his three best friends to make sure he takes the first step. This time, there's no bachelor party. No wedding. What could possibly go wrong? But when the Wolfpack hits the road, all bets are off.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine.Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe.

programme.desc: In a remote mountain tribe, the young hunter D'Leh (Steven Strait--The Covenant) has found his heart's passion, the beautiful Evolet (Camilla Belle--When a Stranger Calls). But when mysterious warlords kidnap Evolet, D'Leh leads a small group of hunters to the end of the world to save her -- battling prehistoric predators, braving the harshest elements and learning their ultimate fate lies in an empire beyond imagination, where great pyramids reach into the skies. Here they will take their stand against a tyrannical god. And it is here that D'Leh finally comes to understand that he has been called to save not only Evolet but all of civilization.

programme.desc: Woody Goes Belly Up - Woody desperately misses his hometown girlfriend, Beth, so Sam and Diane arrange for her to pay a surprise visit. The greatest pleasure they once shared now turns out to be a major problem.

programme.desc: Someday My Prince Will Come - A coat left in the bar arouses Diane's curiosity about the owner, and she fantasizes that he could be her prince charming. Sam puts her to the test by making her agree to go out with the man if he returns.

programme.desc: Those We Leave Behind - Higgins therapist hires her to look into why one of her teenage patients died.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Til Death - When Magnum and Higgins are hired by an anxious groom to look into his bride-to-be on the eve of their wedding, what they think is a simple case of cold feet turns into a web of lies and a life-or-death situation for Higgins.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Devil on the Doorstep - A journalist hires Magnum to track down his anonymous source after they mysteriously go dark, and Higgins receives a new assignment from MI-6.

programme.title: Bokeh
programme.desc: On a romantic getaway to Iceland, a young American couple wake up one morning to discover every person on earth has disappeared. Their struggle to survive the mysterious event lead them to reconsider everything.

programme.title: Needle In A Timestack
programme.desc: A devoted husband will stop at nothing to save his marriage, after it gets destroyed by a time traveling rival. Based on a short story written by Robert Silverberg.

programme.title: Road To The Well
programme.desc: Drifter, Jack, pays a visit to an old friend Frank whose mundane life is upended after the two become involved in a strange and seemingly random murder and journey up to the Northern California Sierra in order to bury the body.

programme.desc: Coromandel - Marine Biologist Jacky Geurts delves into Whangamata's mangrove wars and gets to grips with the treacherous surf rip at Hotwater Beach. Meanwhile, geologist Hamish Campbell digs for this country's earliest human history on Great Mercury Island.

programme.desc: Alaska: Last American Frontier - In southeast Alaska, there's an ice-bound Eden that harbors possibly the richest temperate rainforests of all.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp S2 Ep6
programme.desc: New Zealand - Joel and Nish join a gang of sheep shearers in New Zealand. It's the ultimate work hard play hard lifestyle but can the boys handle both the jobs and the alcohol?

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Frenchness - Griff Rhys Jones continues his journey across Canada, heading to Quebec and Montreal to experience the French Canadian way of life, which includes sampling poutine, Maple syrup and the obsession with ice hockey.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep9
programme.desc: Polo Mints - Gregg Wallace visits a factory with a menthol scent. The Polos factory in York produces 32 million every single day. They have been churning out these little holey wonders since 1948.

programme.title: Universe S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Big Bang: Before the Dawn - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brazil - Robson Green heads to exotic world locations to challenge locals at catching some of the strangest fish. In this episode he heads to Brazil.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Breeding Season - Koalas may seem solitary and inert, but mating season brings a dramatic shift in their behavior, leading to movement, contact, and conflict. As breeding season begins, follow two large males on a mission to mate.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Coast of South Africa - The Wild Coast of South Africa stretches for 170 miles. Here, the waters of the Indian and the Atlantic converge, forcing powerful waves towards the shoreline. This is where the Mozambique-based manta ray researcher Andrea Marshall hopes to conduct her first-ever manta ray expedition within South Africas borders...

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Canada - Canada, where summer is short and time is tight any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hot Day in the New World - Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Penguins - At the waters edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. Its time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion - Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep7
programme.desc: South America - From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion - Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Southeast Asia - With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep9
programme.desc: USA - The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hippo Lagoon - Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambias Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, its full to the brim with water a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life theyve left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory...

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Drought Begins - The Luangwa Valley in Zambia experiences one of the toughest dry seasons imaginable. Seven months with no rain and spiraling temperatures. And with this years El Nino conditions the drought is threatening to be even more intense than usual.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in the Furnace - Its October in Zambias Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Nio event the Valley is in the throes of drought. Theres been no rain since April and desperate animals are drawn to the only remaining source of water in the Valley the dwindling Luangwa River. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. As tempers flare and skirmishes break out, its a dangerous place for baby hippos, dwarfed by the three-tonne adults.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Coming of the Rains - The rains are late. It is the most brutal time of year. Babies born into drought face starvation. Everything is desperate for rain. When it arrives, it is a downpour on an enormous scale. Alien creatures emerge into a different world. The wet season begins.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arid Heart - From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australias most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great Divide - Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Start of Trauma Season - Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Operation Pelican - Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.desc: Southeast Asia - With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return of the Light - Arctic foxes raise cubs on Icelands volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Europe - From the Highlands to the Alps, Europes evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - its not as nice as it sounds.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep11
programme.desc: South Africa - Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism. It all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Big Bend - The Big Bend is over two miles long one of the biggest meanders along the Luangwa River in Zambia. Its a busy spot - home to a pod of hippos who luxuriate in its deep pools, an important crossing point for elephants and place to drink for huge herds of buffalo.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Thailand: the River Basin - Although the Mekong runs down Thailands far eastern border, the influence of the rivers basin reaches across nearly half the country. The east of Thailand is characterized by a complex network of the Mekongs tributaries. These waterways are the foundation of life for many different ecosystems; from extensive rice fields to large pockets of tropical rainforest.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Cambodia is a country that lies almost entirely within the Mekong basin, flanked by Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. The Mekong travels the length of the country entering in the north and tracking south, cutting the region into two halves. Every habitat here is somehow linked to the Mekongs waters. Whether it be its tributaries which connect and traverse much of the countries terrain, or the seasonal flooding that influences landscapes miles beyond its reach.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Cambodia: Seasonal Cycles - This episode follows the seasonal eb and flow of the Mekong through Cambodia - a nation where everything has a special relationship with water. From Cambodias diverse wildlife to people living in the stilt villages of lake Tonle Sap, the Mekong has dictated the lives of everything that lives there for centuries.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Vietnam: Life in the Delta - The final country on the Mekongs journey is the home of the rivers mighty delta. A large deposit of rich nutrients carried downstream from hundreds of kilometres makes this region, the jewel of Vietnams crown, a biological treasure trove.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Save the Giants - The wild coastline of Mozambique stretches along more than 1,600 miles - an area teeming with a diversity of marine life. Some of the worlds largest filter feeders are attracted to this nutrient-rich water. But even these large creatures are defenceless against reckless overfishing. Two of Mozambiques leading marine researchers, Andrea Marshall and Nakia Cullain, set out to find one of the oceans most secretive animals and protect its most well known, before its too late.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Macro Mozambique - The coast of Mozambique is home to giants, like humpbacks and whale sharks, but the tiniest species play just as big of a role in the ecosystem. Meet the scientists who are working against the clock to protect coastal creatures big and small.

programme.title: The Flipping El Moussas S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Market Slows, Inventory Woes - Tarek and Heather take on a groovy 1960s flip in Southern California where mid-century modern architecture takes the forefront.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Glenn Close Gifts A One Of A Kind Home - Award-winning movie star Glenn Close joins Jonathan and Drew to surprise her longtime friend with a backyard retreat.

programme.title: Mediterranean Life S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Sweet Life In Sicily - A former US Navy oceanography officer, his wife and two sons are moving back to her home of Sicily, Italy, after years of living in the States.

programme.desc: From Seattle To Saranda - Adventurous friends want to make the Mediterranean coast their home by buying a property in Saranda, Albania.

programme.desc: The Good Life In Paris - With her dream clock ticking away, a woman is determined to find a permanent address in her dream city of Paris.

programme.desc: A House With Dance Space - A first-time buyer and part-time fire dancer is looking for a home in Washington, DC, with extra rooms to rent out.

programme.desc: Last Flip Before Baby - The countdown is on for Tarek and Heather as their next flip may not be finished before the baby is due! Plus, unexpected changes drive up the stress.

programme.title: Perfect Home: Asia S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Koh Samui - Katie and Jake have dated since high school and always wanted to travel the world together. After their wedding, they bought tickets and landed on Koh Samui, Thailand.

programme.title: Perfect Home: Asia S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Kathmandu - Volunteer English teachers Kylie and Carly are moving in together to start teaching in Kathmandu, Nepal. The only catch is that they have never met.

programme.desc: Liskeard, Cornwall - Leigh and Richard plan to transform a derelict 17th-century flour mill, full of rotten timbers and riddled with structural cracks, into a warm, contemporary, four-floor, three-bed home.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S1 Ep3

programme.title: Donal's Super Food in Minutes S1 Ep2

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep42
programme.desc: Skunked! / Neighborhood Bird Watch - Archibald cant wait to celebrate his Hatch Day with his family inside an impossibly fun theme park. But when Archibald accidentally gets sprayed by a skunk, he must try to get rid of his stank before his special day is ruined. / When Archibald overhears something suspicious about a neighbor, he reports it to his aunts who run the Neighborhood Bird Watch. With Archibald as their new recruit, they attempt to expose the neighbors suspicious shenanigans.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep41
programme.desc: Chalk The Line / Weighting Is The Hardest Part - Eep cheats her way into being considered an adult; Grug learns he's no longer the strongest caveman and turns to a radical method for building brawn

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep69
programme.desc: The Gavel of Justice - Someone stole Bebe's gavel and used it to break a window at the academy! Everyone seems to suspect Alex ... but Pru is certain he's innocent.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep40
programme.desc: Get Rich or Cry Trying / Dingo Unchained - Future Richie regrets running away from Harvey Street and invents an app to alter the past. The gang goes camping in Australia.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep40
programme.desc: Party Poopers/The League - The FAST crew's vacation is threatened by hard-partying toilet frogs. The Crew quits racing when they become obsessed with a fantasy racing league.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep42
programme.desc: Skunked! / Neighborhood Bird Watch - Archibald cant wait to celebrate his Hatch Day with his family inside an impossibly fun theme park. But when Archibald accidentally gets sprayed by a skunk, he must try to get rid of his stank before his special day is ruined. / When Archibald overhears something suspicious about a neighbor, he reports it to his aunts who run the Neighborhood Bird Watch. With Archibald as their new recruit, they attempt to expose the neighbors suspicious shenanigans.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep29
programme.desc: Follow The Leader - When Fishlegs discovers a hidden civilization of Albino Night Terrors beneath Dragon's Edge, he must craft an escape plan after they attack the Riders.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep30
programme.desc: Mystery! On the Yard Express / Lindsay Joins the Band - While passengers on board a fancy train, the Mighty Ones become a part of a classic whodunit. / With an impending visit from Brehts mother, Lindsay discovers she has more fun with her next door neighbors.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep54
programme.desc: Not A Drill - The threat of monsters from the Netherworld portal has Puss running the townspeople through some crazy emergency drills, which no one takes seriously.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep3
programme.desc: Royal Review / Funishment - Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep30
programme.desc: Mystery! On the Yard Express / Lindsay Joins the Band - While passengers on board a fancy train, the Mighty Ones become a part of a classic whodunit. / With an impending visit from Brehts mother, Lindsay discovers she has more fun with her next door neighbors.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep54
programme.desc: Not A Drill - The threat of monsters from the Netherworld portal has Puss running the townspeople through some crazy emergency drills, which no one takes seriously.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep70
programme.desc: Make Room For Fifi - There is a horrid smell in Fifi's garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep71
programme.desc: Slugsy's Song - Slugsy has found something really special. Only Primrose can be persuaded to go and see it with him. Even she is surprised by what she sees!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep72
programme.desc: Stingo's Bridge - Webby has told Pip the story of the 3 Billy Goats Gruff. Soon a troll takes up residence under the bridge in the garden and demands food payment every time the tots cross. Can Fifi get to the bottom of the mystery?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet's Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi's Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep7
programme.desc: Who Wants To Live In Baa's Meadow? - Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep8
programme.desc: Why Are The Ants Visiting Mimi? - Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.title: Olivia Ep13
programme.desc: Olivia And Grandma's Visit - Grandma is coming to visit, and Olivia couldn't be more excited. She's less excited, however, about having to give up her bedroom and bunk with Ian. But when Grandma invites Olivia to share her room for a sleepover, Olivia finds out that rooming with her snoring grandmother isn't as much fun as she thought!

programme.title: Olivia Ep14
programme.desc: Olivia Is Invited To Dinner - Olivia is thrilled to be invited to Francine's for dinner, until she learns that she must reciprocate with an invitation. She worries that Francine will be unimpressed by her family's casual table manners. But after dinner at Francine's proves not to be much fun, Olivia appreciates her own lively family dinners.

programme.title: Olivia Ep15
programme.desc: Olivia Measures Up - After Olivia teases Ian for being too short for a ride, Father mentions that someday Ian may be the taller sibling. Olivia employs a variety of comical methods to stop Ian from growing. She eventually comes to terms with her own height with the help of a great pair of shoes!

programme.title: Olivia Ep16
programme.desc: Olivia And The Old West - The class bullfrog is lose, and Mrs. Hogenmuller leaves Olivia in charge as she goes to track it down. Olivia imagines herself as the sheriff of a Wild West town, keeping order and defending against a stampede of giant bullfrogs. But can shedo it alone, or will she need a little help from Francine?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep5
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock but the damage has been done. Eagle Mama Hen's best friend decides to lend Hen her most prized possession A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep7
programme.desc: Why Warthog Is Ugly - You see there was a time when Warthog was really rather handsome. And did he know it! He strutted around Tinga Tinga as if he owned the place. All the animals were fed up with Warthog's boasting, and then one day Lion decided to give chase. Yikes! Warthog ran headfirst into Porcupines burrow! After that, he was no longer the prettiest beast in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Why Owls Head Turns All The Way Round - You see there was a time when Owl's head didn't turn all the way round. She had tiny little eyes and tiny little ears, and she found it very hard to stay awake. Then one day all the Mangoes started disappearing in Tinga Tinga. Against all the animals better judgement, Owl was ordered to watch over the Mango tree but the mangoes kept disappearing. Desperate to catch the thief, Owl stretched and strained to see who was stealing the precious mangoes, until Ker-Swhing! Her head turned all the way round and she saw who it was It was the ants! From that day on Owl was made the official night guard of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep18
programme.desc: Big Dog Job / The Case of the Slobbery - Tag tries to prove to Mom that shes a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. All she has to do is get them to the playground, but the pups keep running off. \ When a giant, bone-shaped, roller coaster ride goes missing from the Amusement Bark, Detectives Tag and Scooch take on the case of the slobbery robbery.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep67
programme.desc: No Bark, All Bite - Hiccup and Stoick set forth to find willow bark while Gobber holds a cookoff for the merchants until things go a riot and the riders have to protect Berk

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep29
programme.desc: Grand Theft Otto - Toby gets secret transmissions through his headgear and his friends decide they need to infiltrate; meanwhile, Jim forms an unlikely alliance

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep9
programme.desc: Why Do Spiders Build Webs? - The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep10
programme.desc: How Can We Bring The Outside Inside? - Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep11
programme.desc: What's My Favourite Thing About Spring? - Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step - Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparent's marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill - When Bobby finds out Carl can't swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort - The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Not So Secret Valentine / Sammy & Raj's Day Off - All the Guptas love Valentine's Day, except for Sammy who vows not to get caught up in the holiday. Until...// Sammy and Raj pretend to be sick to stay home and watch the Domino Championships, but faking it doesn't go to plan...

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Taken - The boy's imaginations run wild when Dave disappears. When they finally find him, they're convinced he's a zombie.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep505
programme.desc: The Curse of MacBeth - The Chipmunks don't want to perform in the school play, after learning of its curse.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Zeela The Great - Simon's robot Geizmo becomes jealous of Jeanette's robot Zeela, until a sudden tragedy reveals Geizmo's true heart.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep148
programme.desc: The Masterpiece / Whelk Attack - Squidward sculpts a statue of Mr. Krabs for The Krusty Krab. // Giant sea whelks terrorize the folks of Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Taste of Defeat / Scaredy Squirrel - Plankton discovers competition in Narlene's backwoods restaurant. // Sandy spends a night at the Trawler cabin.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Late for Breakfast / Bummer Jobs - Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast. // Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Wait Until Dark - Nate is ready to be treated like an adult, so when Martin and Ellen head out of town, he insists he can hold down the fort ALONE. But when zombies strike, Nate questions his ability to take on life by himself.

programme.title: Nicky Deuce S01 Ep1
programme.desc: Nicky Deuce - Prepare for the craziest summer yet, 'cause Nicholas Borelli has entered the building! Or better yet, the tough city streets of Brooklyn, NYC!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep251
programme.desc: Shell Games / Senior Discount - Patrick discovers that the rock he lives under is actually a sea turtle who overslept. // Old Man Jenkins disrupts business as usual at the Krusty Krab, but Mr. Krabs can't find a way to kick him out.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep252
programme.desc: Mind the Gap / Dirty Bubble Returns - Squidward closes the gap in SpongeBob's teeth, which causes a dramatic and unexpected change in his demeanor. // The newly reformed "Clean Bubble" takes a dishwashing job at the Krusty Krab, where he is tempted by the grime.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep253
programme.desc: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting - Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Away Game / Monster Cash - Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown - When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep111
programme.desc: V.I.Peeved / Seor Class - Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep235
programme.desc: Plankton Paranoia / Library Cards - Plankton hasn't tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and that's making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Call the Cops! / Surf N' Turf - Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep238
programme.desc: Appointment TV / Karen's Virus - The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep240
programme.desc: Bubbletown / Girls' Night Out - SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddy's hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: X Marks the Pot / Patrick's Alley - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109

programme.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

programme.title: Samurai Wisdom
programme.desc: 16th-century samurai fought over a divided Japan. Takeda Shingen was one of the strongest. Known for fast cavalry, stealthy ninja warriors, and unmatched political skill, he still has wisdom to share.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.
